entry.title: Eat All The Things! p1
entry.content:
Now that I'm done moving, and Thanksgiving has come and gone, it's time to jump back into the fray.

I've decided that I've learned enough from "Blocks of Destruction 2", and will be moving on to my next project. It will be a 'Pac-Man' like game.

I've chosen to move back to HTML+CSS+JAVASCRIPT.

Why? Because, frankly I am nearly paralyzed with indecision about what tech to use, and not at all focusing on my end goal. I needed to pick something, so I fell back to old faithful.

Now:

What I've Done

  • Setup basic melonJS app
  • rendering my custom map

Screen Shot (s)

  • none today, sorry!

Near Future TODO

  • load character entity on screen
  • setup character animation
